message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Let's end this quickly.
That's not fair Alice! I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Take it before inflation eats away at the pot.
Okay, I'll give you a little more this time.  I'm still hoping for a quick resolution, so let's do 70/30.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm being more than generous with a 55/45 split.  Let's be reasonable and end this.
I'm getting tired of this game, Bob.  Let's split it 60/40, with me taking the larger share.  Accept and we can both get out of this with something.
